name: Super Robot FPS
description:
Your ship has crashed on a strange planet in a large canyon. You thought you saw a portal at the other end of the canyon. Could that be a way home? You also saw some friendly (?) looking alien robots between your ship and the portal. Let's go. 

W, A, S, D and the mouse to move and look. Hold 'Shift' to run and press 'Space' to jump. You know, typical FPS controls.
